text: Great forest walk with streams and wildlife. Not too busy if you go early morning. Do the walk to Treetop Walk and back. Good workout with lots of stairs up and down. 7km loop. Note that the carpark only opens at 7am-7pm. Free parking.
Feels good when I entered the park. Many trails are there. Can reach to tree top walk from here 2.5km. Need to bring water.

Easy trails and beautiful park to hike with young children. Expect boardwalk with little stairs. Nice stream for observing fishes and insects. Carpark, water cooler and toilets are right at the start of the trail.
A nice, easy going walk where you can choose which route you want to take depending on how far you want to walk or how much time you have. Lots of monkeys and greenery

Beautiful park with lots of wildlife, take water and watch for monkeys.
Free Entry but closed on Mondays so plan ahead.
